data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Si Sa Ket do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Si Sa Ket, Thailand
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Si Sa Ket that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 9,088 believers in Si Sa Ket, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 9,088 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,396,412 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Khmer, Northern people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Si Sa Ket, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Si Sa Ket.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Si Sa Ket, Thailand to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.
